decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to utilize the Omniscience combo to quickly overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells and creatures. Cards like Marang River Regent and Roiling Dragonstorm are used to create a massive board presence, while Moment of Truth and Ephara's Dispersal offer control and disruption. The deck also features various counterspells and removal spells to handle threats from the opponent. Overall, the goal is to establish a dominant position on the battlefield and secure a victory through a combination of explosive plays and strategic decisions.

The focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive creatures, backed up by a burn spells and pump effects to deal quick and efficient damage. With a low mana curve and high tempo cards, the deck aims to quickly build a board presence and pressure the opponent into a quick defeat. The inclusion of efficient removal spells and a few larger threats helps to ensure the deck has options for dealing with various threats and maintaining its aggression throughout the game.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize cheap and efficient creatures along with burn spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal damage as quickly as possible. By playing aggressive threats like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter, along with direct damage spells like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early on while keeping up tempo with card draw and mana fixing. With a mix of creatures, burn spells, and card draw/filtering, this UR aggro deck aims to be a fast and proactive menace on the battlefield.

The deck focuses on utilizing low-cost, aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter to quickly deal damage to the opponent. It also includes efficient removal spells like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage to control the board. The deck utilizes card draw and selection spells like Opt and Sleight of Hand to ensure it has the resources needed to maintain pressure. With a good mix of creatures, removal, and card advantage, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast-paced, aggressive game plan.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and direct damage spells. Utilizing cards like Burst Lightning, Monstrous Rage, and Obliterating Bolt to deal damage directly to the opponent, while creatures like Emberheart Challenger, Manifold Mouse, and Hired Claw put pressure on the board. The deck also includes cards like Sheltered by Ghosts and Shardmage's Rescue to protect important creatures and maintain board presence. Overall, the deck focuses on dealing damage quickly and efficiently to secure a victory.

The deck focuses on using aggressive creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By combining evasive creatures like Spyglass Siren with removal spells like Go for the Throat, the deck aims to control the board while dealing damage efficiently. Additionally, the inclusion of disruptive creatures like Preacher of the Schism and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares adds another layer of strategy to outmaneuver opponents. With a mix of control elements and evasive threats, the deck aims to win the game through tempo advantage and efficient creature combat.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures like Mosswood Dreadknight and Sentinel of the Nameless City early on to apply pressure to the opponent. It also includes removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down to deal with threats and maintain board control. The deck also features some powerful late-game threats like Archfiend of the Dross and Scavenger Regent. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Unholy Annex/Ritual Chamber and Soulstone Sanctuary to generate additional value and outpace the opponent. Overall, the deck aims to be fast, disruptive, and resilient.

This mono black aggro deck focuses on generating advantage through sacrificing creatures and disrupting the opponent's game plan. By utilizing cards like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Archfiend of the Dross to generate incremental advantage, combined with removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down to control the board, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly. The inclusion of cards like Strategic Betrayal and Sheoldred's Edict also add an element of disruption to ensure the opponent has a hard time establishing a solid board presence.

The main concept of the deck is to overwhelm your opponent quickly and aggressively with low mana cost creatures and instant damage spells. By combining creatures like Emberheart Challenger and Flowerfoot Swordmaster with spells like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage, you can deal heavy damage early on and put pressure on your opponent. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Lightning Helix and Sheltered by Ghosts to provide some control and protection against your opponent's threats. Overall, the deck focuses on maintaining a fast pace and pushing for victory before your opponent can stabilize.

The deck focuses on aggressively controlling the opponent's board while applying constant pressure. It utilizes a combination of evasive creatures, disruptive spells, and removal to maintain board presence and disrupt the opponent's plans. By efficiently utilizing resources and applying pressure, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory before they can stabilize. It combines elements of aggression and control to create a versatile and powerful strategy that can adapt to different matchups and situations.

This deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and quick removal spells. It aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently, utilizing cards like Torch the Tower and Smuggler's Surprise to control the board. The combination of powerful creatures like Overlord of the Hauntwoods and Ureni, the Song Unending, along with ramping cards like Llanowar Elves, allows for explosive plays and a strong board presence. By applying pressure early and maintaining board control, this deck aims to defeat the opponent before they can stabilize.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly build up a strong board presence through aggressive creatures like Abhorrent Oculus and Marauding Mako, while utilizing spells like Torch the Tower and Fear of Missing Out to control the board and deal direct damage. The deck also includes card draw and protection spells to maintain momentum and outpace the opponent. With a mix of red, white, and blue mana sources, this Jeskai Aggro deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a well-rounded aggressive strategy backed by versatile spells and creatures.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells, while utilizing the efficiency of low-cost creatures and direct damage spells to control the board and deal damage. The deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent by continually attacking and burning their life total down, ultimately winning the game through a combination of creature damage and direct damage spells. The deck is designed to be fast-paced and relentless, aiming to secure victory before the opponent has a chance to stabilize or mount a defense.

This UW Control deck focuses on using artifacts and enchantments to control the board and disrupt opponent's strategies. It aims to slow down the game through removal spells and counterspells, while gradually building up its own resources and advantage. The deck includes a mix of card draw, removal, and win conditions to outlast opponents and grind out a victory. It also utilizes versatile artifacts like Basilisk Collar and Simulacrum Synthesizer to gain additional value and control the battlefield effectively. The deck is designed to be adaptable and patient, waiting for the right moment to strike and secure a win.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly develop a board presence of aggressive creatures such as Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter, supported by spells like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage to deal damage efficiently. The deck also includes card draw and selection spells like Opt and Sleight of Hand to maintain a consistent flow of threats. The land base provides a balance between blue and red mana sources to ensure spells can be cast when needed. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with fast, efficient aggression in a Standard 1 vs 1 format.

This UW Control deck focuses on removing opponent's threats and disrupting their game plan through various removal spells and counter spells. It aims to establish board control with cards like Day of Judgment and Elspeth, Storm Slayer, while also utilizing card draw and disruption spells like Stock Up and Get Lost. The deck also includes finishers like Marang River Regent and Beza, the Bounding Spring to close out the game once the opponent's resources have been depleted. The mana base is optimized for consistency and includes some utility lands for additional value.
